org.ipdr.api.log
Class LogHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.ipdr.api.log.LogHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
CollectorLog, Log4JLogger
public abstract class LogHandler
extends java.lang.Object

An abstraction of logging. This is provided as an abstract class rather than an interface because a number of useful methods are provided here; and life would be more complicated with pure interfaces.

debug

public abstract boolean debug()
Test whether the log is outputting "debug" (and more severe) messages.

Returns:
true if outputting "debug".

debug

public void debug(java.lang.Object o,
                  java.lang.String function,
                  java.lang.String msg)
Output a debug-level message.

Parameters:
o - The object in whose context this is being output (may be null).
function - The function (method) that is being executed.
msg - The specific message.

public abstract void debug(java.lang.String className,

Output a debug-level message.

Parameters:
